seo.whatIsTitle: What is an AI Meme Generator?
seo.whatIsContent: An **AI Meme Generator** uses **Gemini 2.5 Flash Image** (Nano Banana) to automatically create memes from any image. The AI analyzes your photo, thinks of funny relatable text, and adds it in classic meme format with white text and black outline.
seo.howToTitle: How to generate memes with AI?
howToSteps: Get a **paid API key** from [Google AI Studio](https://aistudio.google.com/app/apikey)
Upload any **image** you want to turn into a meme
Leave text **blank for AI magic**, or write your own meme text
Click **'Generate Meme'** and download (~$0.0125 per meme)
seo.useCasesTitle: Use cases for AI meme generator

faq.question: Is the meme generator free?
faq.answer: No, it requires a **paid Google AI API key**. Cost is approximately **$0.0125 per meme**. The AI analyzes images and adds text automatically.

faq.question: Can it create text automatically?
faq.answer: Yes! Leave the text field **blank** and the AI will analyze your image and create **funny, relatable meme text** automatically in your language.

faq.question: What if my image already has meme text?
faq.answer: The AI will **automatically clean** existing meme text and replace it with new text, so you can remix existing memes easily.
